description: When no one is around, Hans Berlin takes great pleasure in being a bad influence on the stepsons he mentors: Devin Franco and Ricky Verez. After a long business trip, Hans has returned home to find his boys lazily hanging around the house, so he decides to put them to work. First, Hans takes turns fucking both Ricky and Devin in the ass bareback. Later, he encourages Devin to fuck his stepbrother, Ricky, in the ass… just like Daddy taught him!
title: Hans Berlin Enjoys Double Boy-Hole From Devin Franco And Ricky Verez
